title: supp main gold 5 LF Clash team any rank
body:
ign:nuiie
discord: nuiie#6890
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=nuiie 
Dont play league too often these days, have been waiting for something like clash since ranked 5s got removed.
Very reliable, looking for mostly 18+ lads but not a deal breaker at all if youve got anyone under that.

Tad rusty but use to be very knowledgeable on the macro/meta side of the game pre s7, willing to shot call if you need it.
Indifferent about rank/skill of the team as long as there is a good attitude and you're organised im happy.

replies.body: would like to join your team im silver 3 with gold 3 flex on another account to show with all champs and play all roles but support
